name: Traffic Storm
description:
Traffic Strom is the game where your goal is to save city streets from the overwhelming traffic. All the drivers seem to forget how to drive! The fate of the traffic is in your hands now. Use you accuracy, timing and decision-making to avoid accident at all cost.

The goal of the game is let all the cars pass through the level with no accidents. You can control cars by clicking on them, make them go faster of slower.

The game offers you:

  • 40+ levels of various appearance and difficulty
  • 10+ vehicles this different specs
  • 4-10 hours of exciting gameplay
